item.title: What do I do?
item.description: a.tooltip { position: relative; } a.tooltip span { display: none; } a.tooltip:hover span, a.tooltip:focus span { display:block; position:absolute; top:1em; left:1.5em; padding: 0.2em 0.6em; border:1px solid #996633; background-color:#FFFF66; color:#000; } My Curriculum Vitae is availalble here: The 2-page version   and the detailed version My Curriculum Vitae is availalble here: The 2-page version   Briefly, the focus of my work is on understanding and quantifying the relationship between the pest, host, environment and human interaction in diverse agronomic pathosystems, in order to turn it into a practical integrated pest management decision making advice.
